entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • --document-name flag not being respected when generating open api documents at build time. #59097
  • Document that QuickGrid may render additional empty rows on the last page when using a paginator that should be appropriately styled #59096
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions 9.0 needs additional TFM net8.0 #59095
  • JsonTypeInfoExtensions.GetSchemaReferenceId throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException for nested generic types #59092
  • [Blazor] .NET 9 generated JS uses high version syntax leading to compatibility issues #59090
    Backlog
  • SignalR hub Disconnects after 45minutes of connected to Server #59086
  • nuget package 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client' is not compatible with Blazor server webassembly using .NET 8.0 #59085
  • OnAfterRenderAsync does not fire in MainLayout .net 9 #59084

Closed

  • AddIdentityApiEndpoints breaks Blazor's RedirectToLogin behavior. #57900
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Make it simple to remove 'Use Another Service To Login' #18164
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor app template does not respect RequireConfirmedAccount==false when changing email address #54207
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Unable to send 2fa code to mail & unable to obtain GET account/2fa and POST account/2fa in dotnet 8 identity endpoints. #53169
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Changes to IdentityApiEndpointRouteBuilderExtensions made get api/User/manage/info pointless #52311
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Paginator renders extra empty rows when page isn't full of items #57199
    .NET 10 Planning
  • SignalR hub Disconnects after 45minutes of connected to Server #59087
  • Rebuild fails when fingerprinting compiled TypeScript in VS 17.12.0 #58948
  • Fahrenheit is misspelled in Blazor templates #59089
    10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server - ObjectDisposedException with Scoped Services in Blazor Server During Disconnections #58887
  • [Blazor] Detect pre compressed assets in packages, avoid compressing those assets and emit a warning instead #57518
    9.0.x
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59080

PullRequests

Created

  • Add WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities msbuild property #59094
    area-blazor, 9.0.x

Merged

  • Fixing misspelling of Fahrenheit #59088
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Build installers at the end of the repo build and allow building with desktop msbuild #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Handling CultureInfo.InvariantCulture in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #58844
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • remove redundant initializer in HttpValidationProblemDetails #58864
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Fix SignalR Java POM to include description #58896
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Nested Editor<T> Null Reference Exception. Fix a bug in the HtmlFieldPrefix.cs:23 #58888
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
